item.title: POJ3249 Test for Job(æ‹“æ‰‘æ’åºï¼Œdp)
item.description: Description Mr.Dog was fired by his company. In order to support his family, he must find a new job as soon as possible. Nowadays, It’s hard to have a job, since there are swelling numbers of the unemployed. So some companies often use hard tests for their recruitment. The test is like this: starting from a source-city, you may pass through some directed roads to reach another city. Each time you reach a city, you can earn some profit or pay some fee, Let this process continue until you reach a target-city.
